Name: Sky Goddess
About the game: [Game Introduction] 'Sky Goddess' is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with nostalgic movie images. In the game, players will control different aircraft to fight in the air. The difficulty of the game will gradually increase with the level, it is definitely not an easy task to pass the level. 【Game Control】 Each aircraft has three different methods of attack 1: Basic attack 2: Charged attack 3: Bomb attack The power of basic attacks and charged attacks is related to the player's current firepower value. After destroying a specific enemy, the player can eat the ammunition box, up to 4 times. The power of the bomb is constant, and players can also obtain additional bombs by destroying specific enemies.
